BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20085366 SCQ, a proposed site selection of Block 1246, Lot 33 for the acquisition of property for the construction of a new, 390-seat Intermediate School Facility and School Yard in Council District 25, Borough of Queens.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
